api_list.name: Brighten
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imagical.p.rapidapi.com/image/brighten"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imagical.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Crop
api_list.description: API will take url, x, y, width and height in the body and the crop the image and send it back as base64.
api_list.code:

api_list.name: Blur
api_list.description: API will take an image url and blur it and send you the image as base64.
